This email is sent to someone when a article entry is posted by a member to whom they have subscribed.

[header]

[sender_title] has posted a new article entry: [object_title].
Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Advanced Articles - Claim Request to Article Owner
This email is sent to the article owner when a member claim their article.
A member has claimed your article.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message using the Claim For Article page:
SES - Advanced Articles - Claim Request to Site Owner
This email is sent to site owners to take action on claim request for article.
A member has claimed a article.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message to take action on the claim request for article:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Advanced Articles - Claim Approval to Article Owner
This email is sent to the article owner when site admin approve the claim request of article.
Site owner has approved your claim request for the article.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for approval of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Advanced Articles - Claim Approval to Article Owner
This email is sent to the article owner when site admin approve the claim request of article.
Site owner has approved your claim request for the article.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for approval of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
SES - Advanced Articles - Claim Rejection to Claimer
This email is sent to the claimer when site admin rejects the claim request of article.
Site owner has rejected your claim request for the article.

[header]

[sender_title] has sent you a message for rejection of the claim:

[message]

[footer]
